description:
Desperate to reach Luffy, Nami risks her life to escape from an island of weather wizards. Meanwhile, Franky rides a carbonation high through the ice and snow in search of a seaworthy vessel!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Back to Our Captain! A Jail Break at the Sky Island and the Incident on the Winter Island!
Retour vers notre capitaine ! Evasion de l`île céleste et incident sur l`île hivernale
Senchou no Moto e: Sorajima no Datsugoku to Fuyujima no Jiken
Побег с Небесного острова и происшествие на Зимнем острове!
العودة لقبطاننا، هروب من السّجن في جزيرة السّماء وحادثة جزيرة الشّتاء
船長のもとへ 空島の脱獄と冬島の事件
